entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 12:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
